website_summaries.verdict: Offering the perfect balance of comfort and style, these rugged sandals know no boundaries.
pros: Highly versatile design is engineered to take your feet from the surf, to the coffee shop, up the mountain trail, and back again – without ever missing a beat
Holistic foot support from heel to toe, with a no-slide heel cup, superior arch support, and natural-feel toe box
Quality construction that's not only tough and durable, but stylish
cons: Expensive, and their robust construction gives them more weight than other flip-flops

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: I am a die hard OluKai fan and have owned several pairs in my life. These sandals while branded OluKai I am certain they are not. 100% counterfeit! Cheaply made and obviously so...something a fan such as myself immediately noticed. Don’t waste your money. I just left a flip flop shop and bought a brand new pair of authentic OluKai’s and the store owner looked at mine and immediately agreed with me that they don’t look real.
customer_reviews.author: ChadB

customer_reviews.title: Total Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for approximately 1 year and they have been worn about twenty times. I only wear them at the pool and now they have fallen apart. I have owned Olukai sandals before and they have lasted years and those I wore most all the time. I would say if your'e looking for a sandal, don't waste your time buying these. If I could I would return them, but it has been too long and I am out $60+ .
customer_reviews.author: rfornear

customer_reviews.title: Head Over Heels in Love!
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought these OluKai sandals for my trip to Hawaii over a year ago and haven't taken them off since! These shoes, although admittedly uncomfortable at first, broke in quickly and are like walking on a couch. Incredibly comfy. They are great for going out on a warm day and are a fantastic alternative to slippers around the house. Being water proof, I can take them into the showers when I go camping, or outside when washing the car. These shoes are incredibly durable and I'll be sure to purchase a new pair once these ones wear out. I can't get enough of these sandals!
customer_reviews.author: David R Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw - cut the top of both feet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for vacation and was really disappointed. There’s a piece of material underneath which joins the toe strap and foot overlay. The first time I wore them that piece of material dug into the top of both feet causing cuts. It was so painful I had to buy a replacement pair at the resort. I gave the pair a second try after getting home with the same result. It wasn’t because of the fit being incorrect as they fit perfectly. I wish they had worked out because the footbed is extremely comfortable. Unfortunately I disgarded box with full intentions of keeping them being impressed with the manufacturer and glowing reviews so I’m stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: karmaken1

customer_reviews.title: Flip flops for those who hate flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I hate flip flops. I wear them to the beach, and that's about it. When I found out I had plantar fasciitis, my podiatrist told me I needed to start wearing these at home instead of being barefoot. I was really skeptical because these things aren't cheap, and as I just mentioned...I REALLY hate wearing flip flops! Well, I have to say, these things are pretty amazing! It's done wonders for my for pain, and they really are pretty comfortable. I'm not about to start wearing them out or anything, but who knows! Highly recommended, especially for you plantar fasciitis folks out there.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Durden

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and fit
customer_reviews.text: Looking for an everyday sandal. Read great reviews so decided to try. Love the support. Comfort was a problem, so was considering returning. The in-toe strap was rubbing between my toes creating discomfort. Thought maybe because they were new, needed time to be broken-in. Overall, I liked this sandal so was willing to go through the discomfort for awhile hoping they would eventually be broken in. And this worked. Think after wearing them for awhile, the leather in-toe strap soften up and it became more comfortable. Don't know if this was just a minor glitch in this particular sandal. But as of now, I'd buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: ADM

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd pair; LOVE Ohanas
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman with a wide foot (9D US) my poor, several year old Ohanas were about done even before the puppy chewed them. Amazon had the best selection of colors and sizes. Love my shiny new ones. I wish men's came in more colors, but I will take fit over style any day, and the women's are just too narrow. Theoretically they have the standard 2-sizes difference between men's and women's sizes, though I ended up buying size 8 men's because the men's 7 straps were to short for my high instep. YMMV
customer_reviews.author: A. Bear

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: The sandals themselves are incredibly comfortable and look/fit great. However, like many on here, i am too experiencing the sole becoming unglued in the front of the sandal. I've had these for less than 2 years (issue started 6mo ago) and did not expect them to get this way yet. I've had many other brands much cheaper than these that have lasted me twice as long at least without any issue. I hope to contact their customer support to see what can be done.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and wearability.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. My husband is EXTREMELY rough on shoes and wears his OluKai everyday - work and play. He left his at his Dads house over Father’s Day and was insistent on ordering a new pair ASAP. He “couldn’t be without them”. Ordered a pair on the 7hour drive home. They arrived within two days. A happy man!!! This will be this third pair and I’m sure won’t be the last. He loves them! Thank you OluKai!!
customer_reviews.author: Charmayne

customer_reviews.title: Great Flop Flips
customer_reviews.text: Look great and are comfortable out of the box. Getting better with each wear. Second pair that I have purchased. I wear a 10.5 and ordered 11 and they fit. Not oversized like some so don’t expect a snowshoe. My only complaint is they flop when they should flip and flip when they should flop. Maybe better made for the Australia market and they’ll reverse when below the equator.
customer_reviews.author: gamecock88

customer_reviews.title: Great and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Finally destroyed the first pair, purchased in 2013. 2 - 8 day trips to Disney World, never a blister or sore back/feet. Most comfortable sandal I have owned. I also own the Mea Ola's and they are much more expensive and nice but they are not a shoe for hiking a Disney trip or other long days of walking. Buying a new pair today. When the old ones did break it was due to the center toe piece pulling out while I was doing yard work and bending the shoe in a position that put a lot of stress on it. Broke my heart.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Might be sized a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I wear a solid mens 8M in almost all footwear. Only exception is some Sperry products, and this. I have about a half inch to 3/4 of extra space at the toe, but barely any at the heel. For me, they are needing a break-in period as they feel harsh ( but not hard like some Tevas). Jury is out on this. The fit is not enough of a worry that I will return them, and at the price I paid I had to go whole size, but if you have concerns, get the half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Are you kidding?
customer_reviews.text: These have got to be the worst built, most over-priced, uncomfortable flip flops I have ever purchased. I seriously do not understand how these are getting any good reviews. I ordered these, because of all of the positive reviews. Somehow Amazon Prime went from 2 Day shipping to 4 Day shipping and they arrived the day before I was leaving for Hawaii. So after seeing the shoddy build quality and thinking, "well, they just need to get me through a couple of weeks before falling apart.", I then tried them on. They are horrible! So fun day for me. I got to go out and find a new pair of flip flops. Ugh... Anyway, DO NOT RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sandels
customer_reviews.text: Lost my Reef sandals while floating the river a few months back and did a little googling to find the top recommended sandals. These came up as highly recommended, and honestly I was a bit hesitant to pay this much for sandals, but I am really happy I did. I could tell they were different the minute I first tried them. My feet are mort comfortable, they feel like they give better support, and it's been a few months now, and they feel like they're more durable then other sandals I've owned. I will definitely be recommending these to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S. Mauch

customer_reviews.title: Sole's have completely come apart within 2 months of summer. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the sandals is very, very, very poor. Both sandals have had the sole's completely come apart within the first 2 months of use this summer. Which is hard to do considering I am not out and about due to the pandemic. Because the return policy is 30 days, I have had to try gluing them back together a number of times but have officially given up at this point. I bought these thinking they would be lifetime sandals, but overall I am super disappointed in them and would not suggest these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joeput4

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected - very comfortable - a bit expensive
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. I normally wear thin small sock with sandals, and these work Well. Without socks they feel really nice but I have sweaty feet. The arch support is very good. I was worried about all synthetic materials but these look nice and have a lot of color choices. These are expensive but the quality and finishing looks good so I received the real deal. I now prefer to use these over my other sandals and shoes in my house. I most likely will order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick P. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect comfort and style!
customer_reviews.text: Finding shoes that fit well and have decent arch support for my husband who wears a size 16 is often difficult, but boy did we hit the jackpot with these sandals!!! Not only do they feel great and look amazing but the quality is far superior than any other sandal he has had. They have amazing arch support and if you are a Moana fan, the design on the shoe is Maui's hook, which my kids love. They call them Daddy's Maui shoes. Perfect Father's Day or really any day gift! Will definitely buy OluKai brand shoes again and from Green Room who was awesome with communication and super fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: mommy4

customer_reviews.title: Toes Irritated and poor return experience
customer_reviews.text: The sandals looked great and were sized correctly as I already own this brand. Immediately my right foot had rubbing between the toes where the sandal goes. I tried walking around to break them in, just got worse, irritated the toes. The worst part was I wanted to swap these out thinking it was this sandal. They did not have an exchange option so I did a refund. I was very disappointed at how long the refund took to hit. It was at least 2 weeks and I ended up doing an amazon inquiry. I was going to buy another pair but this return experience drove me to a store to buy there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YES! Very High Arch Support!  Finally! Thank You!
customer_reviews.text: I have had bad feet for over 15 years with many many surgeries, I tried them all. I needed a flip flop that provided superior hard support for my high arches. These so far are great! These flip flops are for people who need major feet arch support. fyi; I ordered a half size up and they fit perfectly. Get these if you have Plantar fasciitis, you can thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, they're worth the money. I ordered both these and a top named competitor brand to try, compared the two, and sent the other ones back. (Think of a natural coral barrier; that's the competitor) Good arch support; a little heavier than other flip flops but very well constructed and lots of good looking colors (think dress sandals with long or short pants and a good beach/Hawaiian shirt). I've been very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MTPR

customer_reviews.title: By far the most comfortable flip flops I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: By far the most comfortable flip flops I have ever used. Took them on a one month trip to Asia during the summer and they lasted beautifully. Very easy to clean too. My only gripe with them was that they are not as "grippy" as they claim. For example, I could not walk down steep hills of road with these without slipping. You could go hiking with these, but they are no replacement for a pair of properly treaded shoes
customer_reviews.author: Loki12

customer_reviews.title: These are solid, and especially good on the feet/knees/joints
customer_reviews.text: Good arch support which is rare on a flipflop. Sometimes I even wear these inside just because it's better on my feet/knees that cooking in the kitchen barefoot. Went on long walks while being a tourist and my joints weren't screaming like they would be if I stood for 8 hours in $3 old navy flipflops Started to wear out after one summer, but I used them pretty much all day/every day. For the price I am happy enough to buy a new pair of these every year.
customer_reviews.author: Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Great support, a little heavy compared to other flip flops
customer_reviews.text: These are great sandals. At first you may balk at spending nearly 70 dollars on sandals. They are also much heavier than normal flip flops, but they have a lot more support, and your feet generally will not be sore after walking for a while. I look at it more as an investment since they should last at least a year, and I'd buy several cheaper pairs within that same time frame. Also love the color choices available.
customer_reviews.author: Christiaan Grove

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandal - Second Pair in Four Years
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Look cool. I wear them everywhere. My goal is to wear these all day, every day except for Sundays at church. BTW, positive shout out to the company I bought these from. Wonderful response to a concern I had. Quick, easy and thoughtful. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Hands-down the best sandals for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I have loved OluKai's sandals for years—the quality of the materials, the longevity of the materials, and the comfort of the wear. These Ohana's continue that high standard and are truly the most comfortable footwear I own. For arch support in a flipflip, there is simply nothing better. Highly recommended and worth the price, as these sandals will last you three summers or more, wet or dry, desert and beach!
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: BEST Flip Flop. WORST Sizing
customer_reviews.text: The Good: These are hands down the most comfortable flip flops I have ever worn. I'm told they will conform to my and only get more comfortable The Bad: The sizes on these are ridiculous. I wear between 11.5-12 in most shoes (11 in Chucks. Those that know, know). I ordered these as 12. They were literally the same exact size of my foot. Returned for a 13. NOPE. Had to go to REI where I eventually had to purchase a 14!!! Other than the cashier blushing when she rang out a sized 14 shoe, there should be a note about the size. Maybe these are like watches and sunglasses; if you don't try them on, you don't really know
customer_reviews.author: kochilin

customer_reviews.title: Arch Support
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these sandals for a month and I am very happy with them. The one thing I had to get used to is the arch support. Previous brands of sandals were pretty much flat, so it took a couple of days to get used to these sandals which have a curved arch support. But now I really like them. The curve of the arch support also helps to keep these sandals from slipping off one's feet. Another advantage of these sandals is because there is no leather in the product, they are easy to wash clean with water when needed. Overall, an excellent product and I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jorden

customer_reviews.title: Fake Olakais?
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned a pair of Olakai slippers that have fallen apart in six months before. The strap is coming out of the side, the material binding the straps is frayed and unraveling, the rubber in the soles are very thin and i can feel the pavement. My assumption is that these are fakes and not made by the actual company. I usually get two years out of them. I will not order these again from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Best flip flops I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to replace a pair I bought four years ago and wore every summer all summer long. These sandals are super comfortable and hold up to a lot of wear without showing much tear. Finally replaced my old ones when the soul started to separate at the toe. I've worn these in fresh water and sea water and they don't tend to retain moisture or develop any kind of a "funk" from getting waterlogged. The toe loop is sturdy as well and never popped out even when walking in knee deep water or waves. They're expensive for flip flops, but well worth the price in terms of comfort, durability, and lasting value. 100% would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Parker

customer_reviews.title: Best Sandals of All Time
customer_reviews.text: OluKai's 'Ohana sandal is my favorite flip flop of all time. Now, I wear these day in and day out, every single day, no matter how the weather is, and whatever the activity is. I tend to go through a pair of these sandals 2 years. May break them earlier or later depending on how much stress I put the sandals through. The worst stress I found that breaks these sandals easily is when it is raining and the insole of the sandal gets wet, cause the sole of your foot to slip back and forth on the insole causing a hard jerk on the small indenture that goes next to your big toe.
customer_reviews.author: Connor D.

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy workmanship
customer_reviews.text: So Very disappointed in this sandal. Did consumer report on mens sandals, and this was one of the top rated. Wondering what has changed? Worn off and on over the past 1 yr these have completely fallen apart, strap let go from between the toe. Started looking rough after just a couple months of wear. Didn't even wear them in the water, as they state you are able to. DO NOT buy these, you will be so disappointed. Customer service was no help at all, all I was told was "sorry". Just for comparison, My flip flop before these was a $10 Walmart brand, those lasted 2 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality flip sandal
customer_reviews.text: The colors, materials, and fit are all excellent. The footbed is supportive and does not have any ridges that create discomfort for some foot-shapes. These are now my "good shoes" for outdoor (dry trail hiking, socializing, etc) and indoor activities (except for gardening). I wear a 42 Euro (8.5 US Men's) with a fairly high arch, wide forefoot, and smallish heel and the OluKai size 9 men fit great.
customer_reviews.author: ideatracker

customer_reviews.title: Worth it..
customer_reviews.text: These sandals run a tad small so might want to order 1/2 size or so larger. They fit like a glove and conform to your foot quite well. They are not loose due to the great arch support and ergonomics. So if you desire loose fitting, floppy sandals, don't buy these. If you are flat footed, they probably won't be very comfortable. I own several Olukai sandals and believe they are durable, just don't expect miracles if you run them in salt water EVERY day because they may delaminate. Also, they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Q.

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking and buy!
customer_reviews.text: So I want to just write "LOVE!" Like 400 times. I chose to write they somewhat large because I have wide feet and they fit me perfect without havingto break them in. Super comfortable also.... unfortunately I was blessed with flat feet as well and I can wear these all day with great arch support and no aching feet at the end of the day. Assuming they last I will never buy another type of flip flops again! I've had then now for a month and a half....they are my go-to..... They are my wear 95% of the time shoes and they still look brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole and Tim Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Started out uncomfortable, but improved
customer_reviews.text: These were really quite uncomfortable initially, digging into the top of my foot in one spot and rubbing between my toes. I was regretting not trying Reef sandals, which my fiend enjoys. I persevered a bit and these Olukai broke in and are super comfortable now. It seems ridiculous that zoris should need a break-in period, so I’ve marked down a star.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Feel Good, but Squeak Too Much.
customer_reviews.text: These sandals feel fine and appear well made. I was hoping they would "squeak" less when wet than my old Vionics. But, unfortunately, that is not the case. As soon as the bottoms get a little wet, you can hear me coming from 30 ft. away because of the squeaking. Just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Happy With My Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10.5 Med shoe. I ordered my sandals in size 11, since 10.5 is not available. They fit perfectly. Snug fit - don’t slap my heel with every step. My first pair of OluKai, but probably not my last. I haven’t had them long enough to judge durability but they seem to be well made. I’ve worn them every day since they arrived. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: 706 Trader

customer_reviews.title: The best flops
customer_reviews.text: Great flops. I’m 6’2” & not lightweight. They hold up well. Straps will loosen over time if you wear them a lot. I’ve had my first pair about 18 months. Wear them year round. I own Sperry flip-flops, Reef, Rainbow & other brands. These fit my foot perfectly & are the most comfortable. The foot bed is unlike any other flip-flop. Buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Moe420

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: My new flip-flops arrived last night and I'm happy with my purchase. Originally I was hesitant about paying this much for flip-flops but after seeing what I got for my money I'm glad I took the plunge. The sandals are stiffer than I'm used to, but as soon as I slipped my foot into them I felt the arch support. They contoured nicely to my foot. The stitching around the leather strap is tight and high quality. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I practically live in flip flops, and these are by far the most durable and longest wearing flippers I have owned. I managed to wear through the top layer of a pair, but the sole and strap are still in great shape. It is only cosmetic wear, but bought another pair just to have a nice set. The old set will go in the truck for a spare.
customer_reviews.author: w earp

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband, who lives in flip flops, but suffers from major foot pain (plantar fasciitis). He wore these for 5 minutes and threw his other pair in the trash. They're great quality and look good - am hoping they last, and do far, so good. If they prove to stand up to the beating he gives them, we'll be getting a new pair every 6-12 months.
customer_reviews.author: Clang89

customer_reviews.title: Quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews, and as usual, the one star reviews before making this purchase. One comment made by several is that the toe piece was too sharp and caused discomfort. I totally agree with that. I solved this by taking a piece of 100 grit sandpaper and carefully scuffing up the fabric on the toe piece. That solved the problem. No doubt, after a week or so wearing these sandals on the beach, nature would have done that but by being proactive, they are broken in and comfortable on day 1.
customer_reviews.author: John Coryat

customer_reviews.title: Good while they lasted. TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these sandals, I was skeptical about spendibg $65 on them but they were the most comfortable sandals I've ever owned and I was very happy with them. After only 7 months however, the soles started dekaminating badley and recently the tie strap pulled out. Their website offered little help on the warranty but did give an email adress. I have emailed them 5 times with pictures and a reciept but have had NO RESPONSE. This is completely unaceptable for a pair of $65 dollar sandals and I cannot recommend them after this
customer_reviews.author: Josh P

customer_reviews.title: Converted from Chaco's
customer_reviews.text: I love my Chaco's, they are the definition of durable, I have had the same pair for two years and wear them for a solid 6 months. I wore them everywhere from work to camping and hiking but they would hurt my feet after wearing for a while as I am getting older and fatter. I tried these as a few reviews said they are super comfortable and man that is no lie. These things are dreamy. As soon as I come home my shoes/flops come off but with these I actually wore them around the house when I came in. If they are even close to as durable as my Chaco's are I will never buy any other sandle.
customer_reviews.author: Josh328

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: This pair replaced a pair that I have had for at least two years. They didn't really wear out, but I figured it was time to invest in another pair. I ordered the new pair in a size 9, which fit my feet perfectly. My previous pair was a size 10 and felt a bit over sized. I am very happy with the quality and style of these sandals.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lord

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support, very comfortable, long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome arch support. I love how they stay firmly attached to my foot, so there is no need to curl my toes to keep them from falling off when I walk. Very comfortable. There is no material that absorbs water, so they are great to wear in and around water. This is my second pair, after about 2.5-yrs of constant use my other pair is about used up.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL S MCALEENAN

customer_reviews.title: Great for plantar fasciitis!
customer_reviews.text: Husband has plantar fasciitis and has been wearing shoes/socks all summer so he can use his orthotics. His Reef's feel pretty good but he wanted to find flip flops that made his feet feel great. In our search OluKai got consistently great reviews. He is loving them. Loves the support and can wear them all day. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My husband has always worn rainbows but every season I would have to buy him a new pair because they would fall apart. They also turned his feet brown if they got wet. Bought these for some arch support and comfort and he barely takes them off now. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Mann

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Supportive
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing a pair of Hokua that were a size too large for the last few years. I decided to trade them for a right sized pair of the Ohana since they seem to be more highly recommended. So glad I did because these are the most comfortable sandals I've ever owned. They have just enough arch support and really seem to stick to you like a shoe.
customer_reviews.author: teutsler

customer_reviews.title: Arch Support goes across bottom of instep from left to right, Awesome Flip Flops
customer_reviews.text: This Ohana flip flop has an awesome arch support. This is the only flip flop I have found for my poor flat feet. The arch goes all the way across from left to right if my in step. My feet are so flat I wear orthodics everyday in every pair of shoes. I bought these actually for my husband. We both had bad feet.
customer_reviews.author: Nonny

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I wear between a 10.5-11, bought a 12 and they were snug. After breaking them in they fit great! Fantastic support, very comfortable. I've had reef, rainbow, hurley (nike) and these are probably the most comfortable. The snug fit is more shoe like. Would by again, might buy again just to have a different color. Not sure how much better they can get to justify the $$$ on some models from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: sole becomes  unglued
customer_reviews.text: Second pair where the sole becomes unglued. Unfortunately it happens shortly after warrantee runs out. I wish the company would take notice of this issue and correct. I am not the only one with this issue.
customer_reviews.author: William P.

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals ever!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these sandals. He is not used to the arch support but is getting used to them: He loves the way they feel. He normally wears a 12, but we read that it’s best to order a size up so we got a 13. Good thing we did. Size 13 fits perfectly, and size 12 would have been too small. Very nice looking pair of sandals. He said these are the best he’s ever had.
customer_reviews.author: shoe_girl!

customer_reviews.title: No better sandal on the market
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair of these in 2017. I wore them almost daily for 3 years before foot-bed began to wear out. One of the most comfortable sandals I've ever warn. I also own two other types of Oluakai sandals and they two have been comfortable and of the highest quality. Splurge and buy the best.
customer_reviews.author: Seth P. Teel

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: OluKai makes great sandals. These are very comfortable and they hold up very well. You will probably replace them because they look bad before they break. I would buy these again after mine wear out. They do fit a little smaller than like a Reef, so if you’re in between sizes go up.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S.

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my boyfriend. He had mentioned that he wanted a sandal with a little arch support so a hunting I did go. I didn't start my search on Amazon but after researching on many sites for the best sandal with arch support the choice was made. Once they arrived he put them on. He smiled and immediately started walking around telling me just how comfortable they were. That's all I needed to hear. We then ordered another pair in a different color of course and will be ordering another pair really soon.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Bummer. Come on OluKai! Where's the quality?
customer_reviews.text: Quality of these have severely dropped in the last several years. Even the size of the shoes have shrunk. Ordered a 12 for my brother (who has a pair of 12s that he wears and I guess will wear until the last thread breaks) they were significantly too small. He was really disappointed in the quality too. Bummer. Come on OluKai!
customer_reviews.author: SyrupStrange

customer_reviews.title: 🤙🤙🤙
customer_reviews.text: Best flip flops ever, they take a little time to break in but they are super comfortable and supportive. They feel great and I have plantar so I needed something with a little more support and these fit the bill. Have bought a few pairs of these and always recommend them to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Brettski

customer_reviews.title: A well made flip that fits close to expected sizing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after reading many reviews of these and other similar brands, hoping for a perfect fit out of the box. While they seemed to be excellent at first, after the second day of wearing them I noticed soreness in my feet where the straps attach (not around the toe however) and on my arch. This may be a matter of letting them wear in and getting my feet used to such a firm sandal. I've worn them lightly for the past couple of days and they do seem a bit more comfortable. They are otherwise excellent and I notice less sweat buildup. Will adjust this review after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Flip Flop Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best flip flop I have ever owned. I have purchased 2 pair, each lasting over 2 years each. I live in AZ and wear them year around. They are incredibly comfortable, provide great support and are even great for long walks which is rare in my experience for flip flops. Pair number 2 are still going strong but are getting a bit worn from the mileage, so I'll be ordering pair number 3 soon. I have never experienced any of the separation issues mentioned in other reviews, so I hope that good luck continues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Men's slippah
customer_reviews.text: This is men's slipper. Just like any slipper the main thing is fit and these with the arch fit my feet. I've owned 3 pairs of these, delamination wasn't a problem with mine and I'd probably just glue it myself if it happened. The bottom sole material lasts years and miles of walking with excellent grip on all surfaces, and the the straps don't break. The foot pad material can be slippery when wet but that's what the straps are for.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had most flip flop brands, these are the best by far!
customer_reviews.text: I grew up in Huntington Beach surfing most of my life, and wearing flip flops the rest of my life out of the water. By far, these are the most comfortable flip flops ever! Great arch support, the padding and softness of the straps are perfectly placed and feels great. I bought these the day before Vegas, wore them the whole trip and absolutely no pressure marks, soreness, cuts, redness at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ericness

customer_reviews.title: quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: these are hands down the most comfortable sandals i have ever owned. i barely even had to break them in, they just form to your feet. the comfort and quality justifies the price, for me. as for size- i am a size 12 in nike, i ordered a size 13 in these sandals and they fit damn near perfect. check out the size guide and measure your foot before purchasing. that’s what i did and it was very accurate
customer_reviews.author: danbop

customer_reviews.title: So far so good .
customer_reviews.text: I carefully researched this item before purchase . Many internet sites chose this flip as there top choice . I also read customer reviews which were mixed . I am happy I purchased these as they are very comfortable and appear to be well made . I will re-evaluate in 4-6 weeks an let you know how there are holding up .
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pool Decks Too
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable to wear, even when I am out all day (I work on a pool deck, standing mostly). The foot padding feels great and there is enough arch support to keep my feet from cramping up. Chlorine gets splashed on them pretty frequently but there hasn't been much ill effect that I have noticed and I've had them for a few months now. Overall I really like them and they are durable so worth the extra money you put into them.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Believe the hype...
customer_reviews.text: First off, I did NOT receive free product, discounted product, or any other inducement for my review....as it should be....have to say, so far, these feel great...plenty of arch support, and LOTS of cushioning....has the feel of a well made shoe, but time will tell, as I've only had these a month....don't think I will use these as my every day flip-flop, because they feel more built for comfort and luxury...gonna stick with my Reef Fannings for everyday, and for getting wet...but when something a little "dressier" is needed, these are the cat's meow.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dancel

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: Size up at least one size. My husband normally wears 10 -10.5 shoe. These he can wear 11 and 12 comfortably. 11 fits just shy of end to end 12 gives a little bit more shoe end to end. I thought these were made in Hawaii! But are made in China :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LIVE IN THESE FLIP FLOPS
customer_reviews.text: Flawless design, durable and so comfortable. Found one years ago, the first pair directed me to find another pair. And these are it. Wow. I am flat footed and get pain in time with no support. This has it as I can last hours standing in these. Durable, comfortable and just worth every penny. Favorite foot wear, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Moon

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally Comfortable; Stylish; and Durable
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable slipper (flip flop). A sole that successfully combines support, comfort, durability and traction. Very stylish design and colors. A tad expensive but the durability makes the investment well worth while. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KD Murray, M.D.

customer_reviews.title: not what I was hoping
customer_reviews.text: have nerve issues with my feet, read some reviews that these help. they don't for me. peripheral neuropathy thing. I've had the best results with Sperry Havasu or Baitfish, the cushion is just enough with a durable sole and footpad. the sandals may be good, just not for me. they did look nice.
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love theses and wear them forever. But, after 1 week of light use the different colored rubber parts of the foot beds started separating and coming apart. I expected much more from a $65 flip flop. This also happened to a pair I got for my son from a local shoe shop.
customer_reviews.author: dannyp

customer_reviews.title: The new footbed absorbs and retains odor
customer_reviews.text: The Olukai sandals they made a few years ago would get 6 stars. Unfortunately they changed the footbed material and now absorb smells. My first pair lasted 4 years and never smelled, now I have to replace them every 6 months. They are still the most comfortable sandal I have found, so I continue to buy them, but am dissapointed with the change they made.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Takes the flop out of flipflop
customer_reviews.text: I've had their leather models and decided to get these for more adverse conditions. The arch on these is much more substantial and kind of molds them to your feet, taking some of the flop out of flipflip. Material and workmanship are first rate. I deducted a star because the photo shows an attractive contrast in color between the upper and lower (mustang/mustang), but they're actually very close in hue.
customer_reviews.author: Henry E. Dorfman

customer_reviews.title: Too hard ; not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I've worn flip flops my entire life. I decided to go with this pair because of a friend and reviews. Wow what a disappointing flip flop. Way too hard. Didn't break in at all either. I've worn $30 flip flops that my feet were more comfortable in.
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: Third pair and love 'em
customer_reviews.text: Love wearing these. Standard width fits my slightly wide foot. Only negative was durability. The tread pattern is the first to go. Maybe it's because I wear them too much.
customer_reviews.author: A. MAC

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these....I have the women's version and love them too. We do long walks in these and feel supportive and our feet don't hurt after. Favorites sandals, worth the extra money. We each have had a pair for over 2 years and they hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: TAG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Flip Flops
customer_reviews.text: First time Olukai customer and I am impressed. Great product. Very comfortable given the arch support. Worth the money. Consider getting one size bigger if you have an extra wide foot like I have. My true size is 13 4E so I ordered a size 14 and they fit just right as the larger size gives you a little more on the width so that your heal fits on the sandal in the proper spot.
customer_reviews.author: BigGCary

customer_reviews.title: Feel like great flip flops
customer_reviews.text: Feel like great flip flops. Very comfortable for long duration wearing. I wear size 12 in shoe; always order 13 in flip flops for a lil extra space, however, these 13s feel like they run a bit small. just fyi.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flip flops hands down!!
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair of Ohanas that finally bit the dust after 13 years. They probably would still be wearable had I not left them in the blazing hot 100+ sun for a few hours, making the insole come unglued, curl up, and shrink. Actually the rubber on the sole had turned hard with age and made them slippery to walk in, so I upgraded to a new pair. I couldn’t be happier with them! Same amazing comfort, and they arrived in perfect condition right away. After a short break-in, they feel just like my old pair. Love the color, too! I will never wear any other flip flop!
customer_reviews.author: dirigentbna

customer_reviews.title: Fits great good support
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit of these sandals. Are use an orthotic insert in my normal shoes. And these fit great. This is my fourth pair
customer_reviews.author: cg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wear
customer_reviews.text: I'm flat footed and hard on shoes. These fit me well without bugging me in the arch and they have lasted much better than I thought they would. These were an exact replacement (but cheaper) for the ones that I found at a local store. I almost bought two in case they stopped making them.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Second pair nuff said
customer_reviews.text: Just like several other reviewers, this is my second pair of these. It took me about 6 years to wear through my first pair, and I'm mostly just concerned about how old I'm going to be when this pair needs replacing. Old! Sometimes it's nice to have things like flip flops just straight taken care of. These are da kine brah!
customer_reviews.author: Adam P. Michelson

customer_reviews.title: Have two pairs and love them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these now twice as the orthopedic flip flops don’t fit right. They are either to big or too small. I wish these had more arch support, but it’s better than flat flip flops. They’re very comfortable and until Vionic and other like brands figure out how to make a shoe fit then these are what I’ll buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mit

customer_reviews.title: Best summer shoes by far! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: My husband says these are the best summer shoes he has ever had. He has a broken bone in his foot that cannot be fixed and must have comfortable shoes. He says these fit amazing so I ordered a second pair in a different color and he couldn't be happier. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Harris

customer_reviews.title: Rough edge
customer_reviews.text: After wearing for a couple of hours, I developed an abrasion along the edge of the top strap. Might just be a weird anomaly or my foot is weird. I’ve never had this problem with a flip flop. It was certainly unexpected given the price.
customer_reviews.author: David O

customer_reviews.title: Quality made durable but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Normally wear size 11. These were true to size. Very durable quality made. My older pair lasted 2 summers wearing almost every day. Highly recommend. You get what you pay for. Love mine even though more expensive than others.
customer_reviews.author: John  Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: After wearing these flip-flop sandals for a couple of days, they have formed to the shape of my feet and are very comfortable. I bought a pair earlier this year and liked it so much that I bought 2 more pairs. They're a bit expensive, but well worth it. Also, the quality is very high.
customer_reviews.author: The Old Dude

customer_reviews.title: Best. FlippetyFlops. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is incredible, great water traction as well! It is so rare for me to be emphatic about a product, I had literal feelings of attachment when my first pair broke after many years, miles, beaches, and outdoor jaunts. They have a well contoured and resilient sole that does not crush over time, and as an added bonus, the fit is so perf u avoid that obnoxious ‘SLAP!’ with every step, and no ankle tweaking ‘SLIP!’ leaving the pool🤘
customer_reviews.author: kingstonia

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these looking for relief from planter fasciitis. I was skeptical as to how much good they would really do, but have been pleasantly surprised from the first time I put them on. They won't cure the problem, but when I have them on they sure do make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a Reef person...until now. I will never go back!! These are the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. I wish they made boots, tennis shoes, slippers, cleats, and anything else that goes on your feet!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Z

customer_reviews.title: Not As Comfortable As I'd Like
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as comfortable as previous pair I had and wore out. The strap seems to be stiffer and not as smooth on the inside. But the footbed is great. I'll give them a bit more time to see if they soften up with wear.
customer_reviews.author: TLV

customer_reviews.title: Ordering a larger size, worth the extra cost
customer_reviews.text: Most I've ever paid for flip flops/sandals. But they are comfortable for miles of walking. And I look SoCal hip. That's my teenage daughter in the background, laughing at me. But seriously they are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T. Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Bes' Slippas Evah
customer_reviews.text: These are the best slippers I've ever owned. They were comfortable right out of the box. Within a couple of hours, they had molded themselves to the soles of my feet. Serious all day comfort, and they're built to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchen Kahuna

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited to get these sandals and super bummed when they arrived
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review (went from 2stars when I bought them more than a year ago to 5 stars after a year almost daily usage); After daily usage these sandals are holding up pretty darn well and feel just as they did when I bought them more than a year ago! They might seem a tad heavy at first but that's probably due to the amazingly durable soles and high quality gripping rubber they are seemingly made with.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Dolphin

customer_reviews.title: Best sandal...
customer_reviews.text: I had another pair of sandals for almost 9 years...they were my all time favorite. However, when I purchased the same replacement pair recently they were made from a different material. I tried the OluKai sandals and they fit my feet so much better than other pairs I tried. My only complaint is that they don't stay planted on my feet as well as my old pair and almost have to make a conscious effort to keep them on my feet on long walks.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Junk don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Updated: These are crap. As I indicated in my prior review in May, I had a pair that lasted almost four years. This new pair is peeling up on the edges after 3 months, and they are worthless. See pictures. I bought a pair of these in Hawaii about three years ago and I remember feeling like I had stepped onto a pillow. Suffice it to say, when I ordered a new pair a few weeks ago I was suspecting the same feeling, but the new ones feel stiff and not as cushy, nothing like the old ones (which I still have). Did they change the material? Did I get a knock off?
customer_reviews.author: RFBJr

customer_reviews.title: Great looking sandals and excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Olukai sandals. My first pair was not worn out after 7 years but my new puppy preferred them over his 20 chew toys. The new sandals are a little stiff and tight compared to the old but the appearance and quality are top notch. My hope is that they will relax as I wear them and will eventually fit as well as my first pair. I still highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: TLed

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals: they are supportive, soft on my feet, stay on quite nicely and are quality in materials as well as build. I could walk around all day every day in these! They are a bit wide but that's why I bought them, fit me perfectly. A great product and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Oberon

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been having severe plantar fasciitis. Read reviews saying these might help. They have Helped tremendously. I use them all the time relieved most of the symptoms while my foot heals.
customer_reviews.author: James b Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not Much Arch support
customer_reviews.text: The size runs a bit smaller than the suggested adjustment. I have a need for arch support and while these are better than your cheap sandals, the arch support has a lot to be desired. Maybe it's just my particular case - but I was left with sore feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

product_meta.title: OluKai Men's Ohana
product_meta.description: You will treasure this OluKai™ Ohana Sandal like your own 'Family.' Part of the Makai (Toward The Ocean) Collection. Water resistant, quick drying and multi-purpose sandal. Synthetic leather water resistant upper strap with OluKai logo. Jersey knit lining and neoprene foam backer for added protection. Soft nylon toe post webbing. Non-slip EVA footbed and compression molded EVA midsole for comfort and stability. Uses the deeper, anatomically contoured Drop-in Comfort to fit better and feel great. Non-marking rubber or gum rubber outsole with a coral reef lug design. Measurements: Weight: 8 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Water-resistant synthetic straps with ultra soft, quick-drying jersey knit lining and a soft nylon toe post.
Compression molded, EVA midsole with a smooth drop-in ICEVA footbed provides anatomical fit for sustained comfort
Non-marking rubber outsole with coral reef lug design for added grip
Laser-etched footbed logo and embroidered hook logo on the toe post overlay. Seasonal monstera print lining on select colors
